text: 2001-02 Hong Kong FA Cup was the 27th staging of the Hong Kong FA Cup. It was competed by all of the 7 teams from Hong Kong First Division League and Fukien from the Second Division. The competition kicked off on 4 April 2002 and finished on 14 April with the final. South China won the cup for the eighth time after beating Sun Hei by 1-0 in the final. ==Fixtures and results == source:Rsssf.com, Hongkong 2001/02 ===Bracket=== ==References== Category:Hong Kong FA Cup Hong Kong Fa Cup FA Cup
title: 2001–02 Hong Kong FA Cup
